evidence: Macro failed to start due to initialization error.
conclusion: Critical failure: Macro could not launch properly.
allowed_actions: Restart your computer and try again
Check macro version compatibility with current game version
Ensure system meets minimum requirements

evidence: Macro uses outdated or deprecated commands.
conclusion: Macro may run, but certain functions may not work as intended.
allowed_actions: Update to the latest macro version
Review logs for deprecated function usage
Consider adjusting macro settings to remove deprecated features

conclusion: Macro ran successfully and all tasks were completed.
allowed_actions: No action required
You may review the task summary if desired
Check your internet connection
Retry running the macro
If persistent, contact support or check server status

evidence: Macro is consuming excessive system resources.
conclusion: Performance warning: Macro may slow down or freeze.
allowed_actions: Close unnecessary programs to free memory
Restart macro after freeing resources
Consider upgrading system RAM or CPU if issue persists

evidence: Macro attempted a command that is not recognized.
conclusion: Macro script contains invalid commands or syntax errors.
allowed_actions: Review macro script for invalid commands
Update to latest macro version
Correct syntax errors manually if possible

evidence: Macro is running while system resources are low.
allowed_actions: Close other applications to reduce load
Restart macro after freeing resources
Monitor system usage during macro execution

evidence: Macro successfully collected items or currency.
conclusion: Macro performed tasks and collected rewards as intended.
allowed_actions: No action required
Optional: Review gathered items for confirmation

evidence: Macro could not access required files or folders.
conclusion: File access permissions prevent macro from running.
allowed_actions: Ensure macro has proper permissions on your system
Run macro as administrator
Check file/folder access rights

evidence: Macro stopped unexpectedly and requires attention.
conclusion: Macro execution interrupted; some tasks may be incomplete.
allowed_actions: Resume macro manually
Check log for partially completed tasks
Ensure macro environment is stable before next run
